ajito_honoo_020_cassiopeia_01:
I see you dealt with the grunt standing guard.
Nice work.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_honoo_020_cassiopeia_02:
Stationed inside that base is Team Star’s Fire
crew—the Schedar Squad.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_honoo_020_cassiopeia_03:
Their boss, Mela, is the best all-rounder of the
team. She fixes any and every problem thrown\r
her way, though her methods are...heavy-handed.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_honoo_020_cassiopeia_04:
Our declaration of war must have made her
blood boil.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_honoo_020_cassiopeia_05:
I bet even now, her grunts are hard at work inside
the base, trying to keep her fury under control.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_honoo_020_cassiopeia_06:
That means your best move is to take down all
the grunts nice and quick.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_honoo_020_cassiopeia_07:
Once there’s no one left to help Mela keep her
cool, she should come out to confront you.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_honoo_020_cassiopeia_09:
Ring the bell on the gates once you’re ready to
kick off this phase of the operation.\c
Time to wipe the Schedar Squad off the map![VAR 0114(0009)]
